text: Edward Joseph King (May 11, 1925 â€“ September 18, 2006) was an American politician. He was the 66th Governor of Massachusetts from 1979 to 1983. He was a member of the Democratic Party until 1985, he then became a member of the Republican Party. King died on September 18, 2006 at his home in Burlington, Massachusetts from problems caused by surgery and a fall, aged 81. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2006 deaths Category:Governors of Massachusetts Category:Accidental deaths from falls in the United States Category:Deaths from surgical complications Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Sportspeople from Massachusetts Category:Lawyers from Massachusetts Category:Indianapolis Colts players Category:American football offensive guards Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Edward J. King
